author: "Alina Levine"
date: "November 19, 2018"
output: html_document
---


```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

donor_share_time_compare = read.csv("data/state_donor_share.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  rename(state = x)

ggplot(donor_share_time_compare, aes(x = year, y = donor_designation_share, color = state)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()


```
